name: in progress (planning)
description: The release is in planning and not yet fully defined (initial state).

name: in progress (pending)
description: The release is fully-defined and further processing is pending.

name: in progress (in review)
description: The release is loaded and ready for inspection at a preview location.

name: failed (content error)
description: An unexpected error has occurred while building and the release cannot proceed.

name: rejected
description: The preview content has been rejected and will not be released.

name: public release
description: The release is visible as the current public release.

name: obsoleted
description: A prior public release has been replaced by a newer release.

name: failed (ops error)
description: An unexpected operational error has disrupted processing.
